services_page_description: NewMe Health Clinic offers a wide range of medical services in plastic surgery, bariatrics, dentistry, hair transplantation, and vision correction. Learn more about our services.
prices_page_description: Check out the prices for medical services at NewMe Health Clinic. We offer transparent and competitive rates for various procedures.
prices_page_important_info_text: At our clinic, all prices are final, with no hidden or additional fees. The cost includes: transfer, stay at the clinic, all necessary tests and examinations, surgery, anesthesia (if required), all medications, and hospital food. We provide the final price, unlike other clinics that list a minimum price for the procedure only and then add extra charges.
about_page_description: NewMe Health Clinic offers high-quality medical services in collaboration with leading hospitals and clinics. Learn more about our services and our team.
hero_subtitle: Your path to health starts here
about_paragraph_1: At NewMe Health Clinic, we strive to provide high-quality medical services. Our team of experienced professionals ensures you the highest level of care. We work closely with leading hospitals, clinics, and wellness centers to offer a wide range of medical procedures and services—from routine check-ups to complex surgeries. Our attention to your medical journey goes beyond medical procedures—we arrange your travel, provide comfortable accommodation, and offer translation services.
about_paragraph_2: Our main goal is to make your medical care as comfortable and pleasant as possible. Whether you need a medical consultation or a complete treatment plan, we will be with you at every step to ensure your complete satisfaction. Contact us today to learn more about our services and how we can assist you.
bariatrics_services_intro: New Me Health Clinic offers the following services:
promotions_description: Learn about current promotions and special offers at NewMe Health Clinic. Get favorable conditions on popular medical procedures.
contacts_page_description: Contact information and ways to reach NewMe Health Clinic.
